divs: Sighting DetailsI could tell you this I do know what is happening and the goverment could not refute it but I would most likley be killed but to put this to rest some times you have to take the risk.the head of the councel of what we would call there police his name is bitta. he is responsable for most of the ufo sitings.at this point I can not go much farther than this I don't trust this thing. now the ball as they say in in your hands. let me know if I can help you in anyway.
